description:
Children under 18 years of age

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
Children are never-married persons who live with their
parents or with one parent, e.g. the divorced mother, in a
household, a family or with an opposite-sex cohabiting
couple. There is no age limit for being counted as a child.
Never-married stepchildren, adopted and foster children are
also regarded as children provided that the above conditions
are met.

name: Children under 18 years of age
